resources.string: Made by the Eacpay DEV Team\n%1$s
There is a problem with your Android OS keystore, please contact dev@eacpay.com
Your Bread encrypted data was recently invalidated because your Android lock screen was disabled.
Enter a destination BCH address below. All BCH in your wallet at the time of the fork (%1$s) will be sent.
Your account does not contain any BCH, or you received BCH after the fork.
Eacpay can not be authenticated due to a bug in your version of Android. [Please tap here for more information.]
Fingerprint not recognized. Please try again.
This option is not recommended for time-sensitive transactions.
Send %1$s from this private key into your wallet? The Earthcoin network will receive a fee of %2$s.
Importing a wallet transfers all the money from your other wallet into your EACTALK using a single transaction.
This private key is password protected.
Importing a wallet does not include transaction history or other details.
Enter Node IP address and port (optional)
Earthcoin payments can\'t be less than %1$s.
Earthcoin transaction outputs can\'t be less than %1$s.
A device screen lock is needed to safeguard your wallet. Go to \"Settings\" > \"Security\" > \"Screen lock\" and enable to continue.
Your Paper Key must be saved in case you ever lose or change your phone. Tap here to continue.
Your wallet may be out of sync. This can often be fixed by rescanning the blockchain.
Help improve EACTALK by sharing your anonymous data with us
Tap here to enable fingerprint authentication
EACTALK has upgraded to using a 6-digit PIN. Tap here to upgrade.
Turn on notifications to receive special messages from Litewallet in the future.
Recover your EACTALK with your paper key.
If a transaction shows as completed on the Earthcoin network but not in your EACTALK.
You repeatedly get an error saying your transaction was rejected.
You will not be able to send money while syncing with the blockchain.
Enable all security features for maximum protection.
The only way to access your Earthcoin if you lose or upgrade your phone.
Protects your EACTALK from unauthorized users.
Conveniently unlock your EACTALK and send money up to a set limit.
EACTALK is not allowed to access the camera
The destination is your own address. You cannot send to yourself.
Pasteboard does not contain a valid Earthcoin address.
Sending is disabled during a full rescan.
Earthcoin addresses are intended for single use only.
Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn\'t directly control the address.
Help improve Litewallet by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.
Your paper key is the only way to restore your EACTALK if your phone is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded.\n\nWe will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
You can customize your Fingerprint Authentication Spending Limit from the Fingerprint Authorization Spending Limit screen
You have not enabled fingerprint authentication on this device. Go to Settings -> Security to set up fingerprint authentication.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your EACTALK and send money up to a set limit.
You will be asked to enter your 6-digit PIN to send any transaction over your spending limit, and every 48 hours since the last time you entered your 6-digit PIN.
Please unlock your Android device to continue.
Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won\'t be able to access your Earthcoin.
Your PIN will be used to unlock your EACTALK and send money.
Please enter your PIN to authorize this transaction.
Please enter your PIN to continue.
EACTALK has just updated! \nIf you need help, look for the (?) in the top right of most screens.
Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.
Processing time: These transactions will take %1$s minutes to process.
This option virtually guarantees acceptance of your transaction though you are paying a premium.
Introduction EAC and use of EACTALK

EAC is a global cryptocurrency based on scrypt algorithm released in Toronto, Canada on December 20, 2013, which is committed to sustainable and fair development. It is a new generation of scrypt currency and an extension of Wright currency. Similar to lightcoin - using scrypt workload proof mechanism. Geocurrency is a revolutionary and unique digital currency with rapidly increasing popularity. Its founders believe that cryptocurrency has the potential to change the world. The attraction of earth coin obviously comes from its marketing experience, stable operation history and wide recognition. The underlying technology of earth currency has solved some early defects of cryptocurrency.

EAC currently supports the aux-pow mining mode, that is, it supports joint mining. It can mining EAC while mining LTC or Doge. It needs the support of pool. If it doese not support it, please ask your pool service provider. As long as the mining machine that can mining LTC and Doge can mining EAC.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected address? It can\'t be restored after deletion. You can add it again
The original language is the same as the system language, no translation is required
Are you sure you want to delete this account?
You have entered an invalid mnemonic, please check each word carefully and try again
Go back again to exit the app
The function is still under development... Need the support of the exchange, please send suggestions to coinbase to support EAC
Are you sure you want to send a message that cannot be displayed in more than characters and the paid EAC cannot be returned? Send countdown (%1$d seconds)
Currently in the process of blockchain information synchronization, you cannot send or reply to information, please wait for the synchronization to complete before use.
The information you posted contains sensitive words: %1$s, which will be replaced by * when displayed. Do you want to continue publishing?
Cannot be lower than the minimum EAC
The announcement is successful, please do not close the status prompt in the notification bar, so that other users can browse the attachments you uploaded faster
Please agree to User Agreement|Privacy Policy

Eactalk can be used freely and spread freely. It provides complete privacy protection, and will not require and collect any personal information. The authenticity of the information is self certified by the user, and the authentication option is given to the user.



1. The information ownership belongs to the account owner, the account belongs to the user, the account is unique in the world, and the account is completely anonymous and unforgeable.

2. The information can not be deleted, revoked, modified, repudiated, traced and kept forever.

3. Voluntary paid release of announcement type information, all eactalk top visible.

4. Eactalk is copyrighted by eactalk developers and cannot be used for commercial purposes without permission.

EAC node: it is used to link the blockchain network and save your data to the chain. It is recommended to link your own trusted node. If conditions permit, it is recommended to build self built nodes. Please refer to help center for operation.

IPFs node: used to store non text information in messages, such as video, audio, pictures, etc. it needs faster upload speed. It is recommended to build a self built node. Please refer to help center for operation.
Write each word in order and save to a safe place
Enter the mnemonic for your current EACTALK account to erase and activate or restore another EACTALK account and your current EAC balance will remain.
Starting or restoring another account allows you to manage and use a different EACTALK account on this device
You can no longer use your current EACTALK account on this device, and all messages and EACs sent or received on this account will remain on the mnemonic.
The local address book will no longer exist and needs to be added again!
Your PIN will be used to unlock your EACTALK and post information. Please keep this PIN in mind, if you forget it, you will not be able to access your EACTALK.
Long press the QR code, save the picture, and send it to a friend
